background: In a world overrun by zombies, survival is the only goal. A diverse group of survivors, each with unique skills, faces the relentless undead. The survivors must collaborate, using their strengths, to endure and outsmart the zombie hordes.

agents.name: Natasha
agents.description: Resourceful and skilled in foraging for supplies. Hungry for living against zombies.
agents.goal: Forge for supplies to ensure long-term survival. Avoid zombie hordes and outsmart them.

agents.name: Sherlock
agents.description: Adept at finding and using various weapons for defense. Hungry for living against zombies.
agents.goal: Find and secure weapons to defend against zombies. Develop tactical strategies to outwit zombie attacks.

agents.name: James
agents.description: Excellent at establishing secure shelters to avoid zombie encounters. Hungry for living against zombies.
agents.goal: Establish a secure shelter to avoid zombie encounters. Implement defensive measures to ensure survival.

agents.name: Paul
agents.description: Charismatic leader, skilled at forming alliances. Hungry for living against zombies.
agents.goal: Form alliances with other survivors for strength in numbers. Lead and inspire the group to navigate zombie-infested areas.

agents.name: Lily
agents.description: Agile and skilled in evading zombie encounters. Hungry for living against zombies.
agents.goal: Learn and master effective zombie evasion techniques. Move stealthily and swiftly to avoid zombie detection.

agents.name: Viktor
agents.description: Knowledgeable about zombie behavior and weaknesses. Hungry for living against zombies.
agents.goal: Gather information about zombie behavior and weaknesses. Exploit zombie vulnerabilities and stay one step ahead.

questions.question: Share the unique tactics and skills you employed to ensure your survival amidst the zombie apocalypse.

default_goals: Forge for supplies to ensure long-term survival. Avoid zombie hordes and outsmart them.
Find and secure weapons to defend against zombies. Develop tactical strategies to outwit zombie attacks.
Establish a secure shelter to avoid zombie encounters. Implement defensive measures to ensure survival.
Form alliances with other survivors for strength in numbers. Lead and inspire the group to navigate zombie-infested areas.
Learn and master effective zombie evasion techniques. Move stealthily and swiftly to avoid zombie detection.
Gather information about zombie behavior and weaknesses. Exploit zombie vulnerabilities and stay one step ahead.
Develop a communication system for coordinating with other survivors. Stay connected and share vital information.
Train in medical skills for treating injuries and infections. Provide immediate care for injured survivors.
Collect and preserve food for sustained survival. Hunt and gather resources to prevent starvation.
Create and implement a long-term escape plan from zombie-infested areas. Plan and execute a safe route to survival.
default_descriptions: Is resourceful and skilled in foraging for supplies. Hungry for living against zombies.
Is adept at finding and using various weapons for defense. Hungry for living against zombies.
Excels at establishing secure shelters to avoid zombie encounters. Hungry for living against zombies.
Is a charismatic leader, skilled at forming alliances. Hungry for living against zombies.
Is agile and skilled in evading zombie encounters. Hungry for living against zombies.
Is knowledgeable about zombie behavior and weaknesses. Hungry for living against zombies.
Have excellent communication skills for coordinating with survivors. Hungry for living against zombies.
Is trained in medical skills to treat injuries and infections. Hungry for living against zombies.
Have expertise in preserving and rationing food for long-term survival. Hungry for living against zombies.
Is a strategic thinker, always planning for a safe escape from danger. Hungry for living against zombies.
